description: Dive into Donald Trump's unexpected entry into the NFT realm through the acquisition of Meebits, and explore its effects on digital ownership, the metaverse, and the potential shifts in the NFT market.
keywords: Donald Trump, Meebits, NFTs, metaverse, digital ownership, blockchain technology, cryptocurrency, NFT market, digital art, crypto market
title: Donald Trump's Foray into the Metaverse: The Meebits Acquisition
